video.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends
video.synopsis: Zoom along with dump truck Chuck and his motorized pals as they have all kinds of crazy adventures and learn what it means to be a good friend.

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is eager to help out around the truck stop, but he needs help from his friends. / Looking to avoid a breakdown, Chuck exercises to the extreme.
episodes.title: Special Delivery / Buffing Up

episodes.synopsis: Chuck accidentally breaks an important piece of his mom's equipment. / Chuck experiments with ways to transform himself into a larger truck.
episodes.title: Tough Break / Little Big Chuck

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and his friends use teamwork to get Rowdy out of the mud. / The gang works together to figure out the best way to fly.
episodes.title: Race to the Race / When Trucks Fly

episodes.synopsis: Chuck builds a fort with his friends. / Chuck and his pals play circus, but Boomer becomes embarrassed when he falls doing a trick.
episodes.title: Fort Chuck / A Hop, Slip and a Jump

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck gets nervous about a trip to the mechanic, his friends do their best to hide him. / Chuck races through his chores and does a poor job.
episodes.title: The Checkup / The Shortcut

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and friends dig a deep hole looking for treasure. / When the gang decides to make their own movie, Chuck wants to do it all by himself.
episodes.title: Digging Deep / Lights, Cameras, Trucks!

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by a cool rock 'n' roll tour bus, Chuck and friends decide to start a band. / Detective Chuck is on the case for Rowdy's missing horn.
episodes.title: Truck 'n' Roll / Mystery, He Rode

episodes.synopsis: Chuck has an extra ticket to a show and must choose only one friend to take. / Chuck and friends compete to win a giant trophy.
episodes.title: Choosy Chuck / The Best

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck encounters a pothole, he tries to cover it up instead of fixing it properly. / Chuck plans the perfect party for his brother's homecoming.
episodes.title: The Pothole / Chuck's Perfect Plans

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is in charge of watching his younger cousin. / When the gang plans a campout, Chuck suggests a practice run to make sure they won't get scared.
episodes.title: Chuck in Charge / Trucks vs. Wild

episodes.synopsis: After a meteor shower, Chuck is on the lookout for aliens. / Chuck and friends try to keep a TV villain from causing trouble at the truck stop.
episodes.title: Unidentified Rolling Object / On a Role

episodes.synopsis: At Christmas, Boomer admits that he wants to be a snowplow when he grows up. / Chuck and friends try to stay up late to welcome in the New Year.
episodes.title: Up All Night / Boomer the Snowplow

episodes.synopsis: After breaking a gasket, Chuck begins "sleep-driving." / Chuck and friends dare each other into performing stunts around the parts yard.
episodes.title: Sleep-Driving Chuck / Chuck-Atomic

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and friends go in search of the Lost Hubcap of Gold. / Chuck does his best to keep his shiny new hood ornament clean while playing with friends.
episodes.title: Chuck and the Lost Hubcap of Gold / Shine On

episodes.synopsis: Chuck borrows Rally's big new racing wheels but can't control them. / Chuck and friends surprise Haulie by planting flowers around the repair shop.
episodes.title: Where There's a Wheel / Flower Power

episodes.synopsis: Chuck-Atomic, Chuck's superhero alter ego, drives around assisting those in need. / Rally's Coach gives Chuck a chance to show him what he's got.
episodes.title: Daredevil Chuck / Chuck's Big Break

episodes.synopsis: When their video game breaks, the boys continue playing ... in real life. / Chuck and friends try to prove that they're interested only in racing.
episodes.title: Game On / Kid Stuff

episodes.synopsis: The boys race against one another to win a radio contest. / Rally's in a racing slump, and Chuck is determined to help him regain his confidence.
episodes.title: Contest Countdown / Revving Up Rally

episodes.synopsis: Biggs mimics Chuck in an attempt to gain the respect of the group. / Chuck pretends he isn't sick so he can continue playing with his friends.
episodes.title: Being Biggs / As the Engine Coughs

episodes.synopsis: After hearing sea stories from Salty Saul, Chuck and friends try to build a boat. / Chuck and pals open a business but cannot decide what to make.
episodes.title: Anchors A-Wheel / Mind Your Own Business

episodes.synopsis: Chuck is jealous when Rally helps Biggs work on his racing. / Chuck recreates the night his parents first met in order to resolve their disagreement.
episodes.title: Brother Borrowing / When Haulie Met Porter

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and friends head to the parts yard to explore their artistic talents. / A visually impaired motorcycle teaches Chuck about using other senses.
episodes.title: The Art of Being Chuck / Senses of Direction

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and friends decide to create their very own beach. / Hounded by paparazzi, a celebrity truck turns to Chuck and the gang to help him lay low.
episodes.title: Beach Blanket Uh-Oh / Hide and Seek

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and the gang build a giant monster-like vehicle in the parts yard. / Chuck and friends play with and learn from Kazuo, Soku's Japanese cousin.
episodes.title: Attack of the Fifty Foot Chuck / Soku-Kun

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and friends start an astronomy club. / Boomer offers to help Chuck with his work after he accidently hurts him playing a game.
episodes.title: Join the Club / Fender Bender

episodes.synopsis: When Soku doesn't show up to play, Chuck and friends begin to guess why. / Handy and the gang use science to experiment building a bridge.
episodes.title: Did You Hear/Bridging the Gap

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and his pals refurbish a machine to help Rowdy build bigger things. / Chuck trains his grandfather in the hopes of winning a truck show.
episodes.title: Rowdy's New Rigg / Grandpa Treadwell

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and his pals build a super sweeper machine to clean up the truck stop. / Haulie and Porter leave Chuck and his pals with a babysitter.
episodes.title: Super-Sweeper-Chuck / Sitter Shenanigans

episodes.synopsis: The boys follow the giant tire track of a legendary truck called Bigtire. / Chuck promises to clean up the track, but Biggs does most of the work.
episodes.title: The Legend of Bigtire / Hard at Work

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck neglects to do his daily maintenance, he gets stuck in reverse gear. / Chuck and his friends challenge a visiting truck to a race.
episodes.title: Chuck Backs Up / Speed Indeed

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Vertie teaches Chuck and his friends a trick on the half-pipe. / A girl truck tries to get Chuck and his buddies to help with a dance routine.
episodes.title: Vertie's Stunt School / Dancing Wheels

episodes.synopsis: To earn a scouting badge, Chuck and his pals track down a list of hidden items. / Chuck and his friends need help building a slide onto the clubhouse.
episodes.title: Keep on Trackin' / The Bully

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious ghost leads Chuck and his pals on a spooky chase. / When Handy loses his beloved screwdriver, he also loses his confidence.
episodes.title: Charlie the Screwdriver / Ghost Stories

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and his buddies help Rad Taillights shoot a television commercial. / Rowdy's favorite singer, Kurt Camshaft, visits Treadwells.
episodes.title: Commercial Trucks / Rowdy the Rockstar

episodes.synopsis: Chuck gets the royal treatment when he swaps places with visiting Prince Piston. / Chuck and Soku get as muddy, dirty and stinky as they possibly can.
episodes.title: Prince Chuck / The Dirt on Chuck

episodes.synopsis: Chuck tries to prove that he's careful enough to have a fragile navigation device. / After getting punished, Chuck resolves to leave home.
episodes.title: Pop Goes the Inner Tube / Runaway Chuck

episodes.synopsis: Chuck worries that his Mother's Day card isn't good enough for his mom. / Chuck and his pals try to invent a game with no rules.
episodes.title: Fools for Rules / Mother of All Gifts

episodes.synopsis: When Chuck regifts a coveted new toy to his pal Boomer, he sets off a series of kind acts that proves generosity can be contagious.
episodes.title: The Re-Gifters

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Goodwheels appoints Chuck as his deputy mayor for the day. / Chuck and his pals tear down an old garage to make way for a new building.
episodes.title: Wallbashers / Mayor Chuck
